name: I Love My Cats
synopsis: Become a best friend to the animals by taking in abandoned kittens. Look after them every day so they flourish with their new family: feed them, stroke them, tend them, raise them and play with them. Discover the town around you: take them for walks in the park, enter competitions on the beach and buy new toys for them at the market. - 8 cat breeds: Siamese, Maine Coon, Abyssinian, Tabby, British Shorthair, Havana Brown, Scottish Fold, Snowshoe. - 15 activities for playing and caring for your kittens. - Change the way they look with a wide range of accessories.
